name: FPS Assassin Guns War Strike
description:
Welcome to fps assassin guns war strike, we are presenting this amazing fps shooting game. This game has war environment inside a building. In this game, player will shoot and complete mission of shooting within a building. This game has twenty addictive levels. First level will be unlocked and next upcoming levels will be locked. Every level of this game has separate directions by previous one.
Player can found more health, bullets and such other things in game play as well. These things can be found in boxes indicated with light. Fire these boxes and get your rewards. This game has multiple weapons likes rifles, pistols and shot guns. Player can select his favorite gun form weapon selection panel. These guns has wide range of damage, range, fire rate, and accuracy. Enemy will use different kind of barriers and hurdles to attack on player. Use strategy and won the game
Features
FPS shooting game
Amazing environment
Multiple weapons
20 challenging levels
